title: ZENITH Watches - The Future of Swiss Watchmaking since 1865
text: DEFY SKYLINE CHRONOGRAPH Crafted for the first time in black ceramic, the DEFY Skyline Chronograph takes on a bold, contemporary presence that evokes the contrast of light and shadow across the urban skyline. Endowed with an evolution of ZENITH’s legendary high-frequency chronograph movement, this timepiece displays 1/10th of a second, embodying the Manufacture’s dedication to precision. SHOP NOW
